channel.title: Coding items into shops or adding new shops
channel.description: whenever i try adding a item to a shop it wont work and when i try adding a new shop it still wont work please help!

item.title: Coding items into shops or adding new shops
item.dc:creator: @JuniorCautionz JuniorCautionz
item.description:
@JuniorCautionz wrote:

Go To Your Source… Autospawn.cfg Use That To Spawn Yur NPC Id And Your X And Y Coords Then Once Finished Compile…
Run Server Etc…
To Edit Items In Shop Go To Your Source Find The File Which Says Shop.cfg And Once Clicked It Should Have The Names Of Shops Etc…

Autospawn.cfg Will Have Codes Like This
spawn = 170 3089 3496 0 0 0 0 0 1 (Make Sure You Click TAB On Yur Keyboard To Space)

Then Go To Shop.cfg
You Will Have a Code Like This ITEM ID Ammount ITEM ID Ammount ITEM ID Ammount
shop = 47 Staff Shop 2 2 13679 1 13678 1 13677 1
Make Sure You Carry On Like That ITEM ID Then Click TAB Enter Ammount

Hope I made It Clear As I Can

Read full topic
item.source: Coding items into shops or adding new shops
